data.title: WORLDWAR: UPSETTING THE BALANCE
data.meta_description: New York: Ballantine Books, 1996 . Octavo, cloth-backed boards. First edition. Third book of a four-volume alternate history series set during World War II, preceded by WORLDWAR: IN THE BALANCE and WORLDWAR: TILTING THE BALANCE. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. #169529 30151 . Item #30151
data.text:
Turtledove, Harry.

New York: Ballantine Books, [1996]. Octavo, cloth-backed boards. First edition. Third book of a four-volume alternate history series set during World War II, preceded by WORLDWAR: IN THE BALANCE and WORLDWAR: TILTING THE BALANCE. A fine copy in fine dust jacket. (#169529) (30151). Item #30151
